name: Hydrate Detangling Leave-In Conditioner for Dry, Frizzy Hair
about: What it is:A leave-in conditioner that detangles, hydrates, and nourishes hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Detangles dry hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: Rich in antioxidants and provides moistures..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Verb Hydrate Leave-in Conditioner detangles, hydrates, and nourishes hair. Powered by argan oil, babassu oil, and a moisture-locking ceramide, this leave-in conditioner adds extra moisture, fights frizz, and leaves hair soft and tangle-free..Fragrance Description:Amber and warm jasmine.
ingredients: -Argan Oil: Rich in antioxidants and provides moistures..-Babassu Oil: Locks in moisture. .-Moisture-Locking Ceramide: Smooths hair, promotes shine, and increases hair elasticity...Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Ceramide NG, Anhydroxylitol, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Saccharide Isomerate, Polyglyceryl-10 Caprylate, Xylityl Sesquicaprylate, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Polyacrylate-1 Crosspolymer, Silicone Quaternium-16, Panthenol, Parfum/Fragrance, Quaternium-91, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Butyloctanol, Acetic Acid, Undeceth-5, Undeceth-11, Benzalkonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Methyl Palmitate, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to towel-dried hair on the mid-lengths and ends after using any Verb shampoo and conditioner (sold separately). .-Comb hair and style as usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the old versions of this and it was amazing!! This one is okay, the scent is way too strong!! I wish they still made the old one!

reviews.review_title: Not for curly hair frizz control
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product but it's not my favorite. If you have straight hair or hair that isn't dry, this should work. I have soft curls and I don't believe this product is the best option to style curls at all. It's too runny.  I loveeeeee the smell of it, it smells like a fancy hair salon. My best use is detangling or using it before I heat style my hair. That way, it smells good and I have enough leave-in conditioner. Otherwise, can't use for my curls.

reviews.review_title: Nice secondary product for daily use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a nice daily product. However, if your hair is on the drier side, you will need to use a secondary moisturizing product every so often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice leave-in conditoner spray by Verb for dry and frizzy hair. My roots can be very oily while my ends manage to be slightly frizzy. This leave-in works very well at smoothing out my frizziness but I have to be careful not to apply any to my roots. I love the beautiful fragrance this has and it lasts for a while and makes me want to use it more than I need to! This would be a perfect leave-in conditioner for dryer hair types than mine but I love it for my frizzy ends.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your routine, afro-curls friendly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product, very moisturizing for my afro kinky hair. This leave-in helps my curl creams work alot better. I rate 4 stars only because I don't like the spray nozzle they chose to put the product in. It makes application kind of difficult. Other then that the product itself is really great and I really love how it's free from alot of chemicals. Stuff like that matters alot to me because it can effect your health.

This leave-in conditioner helped to hydrate and soften my hair. I noticed that my curls were more defined and slightly less frizzy, although the reduction in frizz could be more pronounced. My hair was easier to detangle, as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does detangle, it only defrizzed my hair while my hair was still wet from it, it conditioned it a little but no where near as much as expected. I have curly frizzy and thick red hair and my 2 year old has a lot of hair that's hard to brush. This product works best as a detangler in my experience. It didn't provide any remefication to the damage of my hair but it didn't damage my hair more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first experience with Verb products and I am now a new fan! First of all, this leave-in smells absolutely amazing. It smells fresh and clean and definitely leans in unisex territory! It makes my hair feel tangle free and nourished! Although, I feel like it is a little heavy on follicles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves your hair shiny, hydrated, and smelling so good for multiple days before you shampoo!

reviews.review_title: Not the best for curly hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift in exchange for my honest review and Ive been using this leave in for a few weeks now. This product isnu2019t bad, but I donu2019t find it to be a must-have either. I have natural 2c/3a hair that is very prone to frizz and has some damage. After using this product, my hair is generally soft but I donu2019t find the frizz to be moderately reduced when I wear my hair natural. If i blowout my hair or heat style, I generally have better results and less frizz. Not a bad option if your hair is straight/wavy, but I donu2019t find it to be enough for my curly hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave-in conditioner! It has made my hair feel so much softer and less frizzy, and just healthier overall. Also, the nozzle sprays really good and evenly, which an uneven spray was something that bothered me with other leave-in conditioners Iu2019ve tried. I donu2019t totally love the smell, but thatu2019s just me personally, and it doesnu2019t smell bad, just not my taste. Still, all in all, itu2019s an amazing spray, and I definitely recommend it!
I don't think it actually helped with my frizz, even when I was using it along with a satin bonnet. The smell was not what I expected at all, was kinda meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Verb Hydration Leave-In Conditioner is an excellent product for anyone seeking to enhance moisture and manageability in their hair. Its lightweight formula easily absorbs, leaving hair soft without weighing it down. Infused with nourishing ingredients, it helps to tame frizz and enhance shine, making it perfect for all hair types. The subtle scent is pleasant but not overpowering. Overall, itu2019s a fantastic addition to any hair care routine for a hydration boost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great option for leave-in conditioner! I have naturally wavy hair and it gets frizzy after washing and styling. I spritzed some of this into my hair (it smells so refreshing-it reminds me of green tea, jasmine, and aloe vera) after shampooing and conditioning. My hair was no longer frizzy at all! Would recommend!

reviews.review_title: An essential part of my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has become a consistent part of my routine. It smells amazing and is so good for helping me detangle my hair. I use it in addition to my other hair products and have noticed it leaves my hair more silky and shiny than my other products alone. Itu2019s also very affordable, and I canu2019t mention enough how good it smells, very floral. The scent also stays in my hair for at least 2 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Verb for sending this leave in conditioner! If you have curly hair (from 3b to 4c) this leave in conditioner is probably too light to do anything. I did like it to help detangle but I did not feel like it was very hydrating for courser hair types. There are other products that help detangle while also helping curls form and hydrate at the same time. The smell reminds me of Baccarat rouge 540. I prefer more water/beach clean smell but if you are a fan of warmer more vanilla scents, you will appreciate this smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing and it works so well. I will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Helps to detangle my hair really well, but I donu2019t think itu2019s as hydrating as I need for my hair. It looked good the first day after use, but every time by the second day I needed more because my ends looked drier than the previous day, which is not something Iu2019m used to. I donu2019t think it helped with my frizz either. It smells okay but all in all, I think the product is not suitable for my hair.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: Not only does this product smell amazing, it's also so hydrating. After one use I started noticing a difference. It made my tangles easier to brush, cuts down on my frizziness, and softens my hair. This is amazing and a new staple in my hair care routine. I highly recommend this is if you have dry or damaged hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m happy with how well this works! Itu2019s very lightweight, non-greasy, helps with frizz, and gives my hair a lot of shine. The fragrance is a little strong at first, but becomes subtle when it dries down. A few sprays helps get even the worst of tangles out of my hair with minimal brushing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the smell of the product and it did a good job helping me detangle my hair after the shower. I did feel like there was a slight residue the next day but when I tried using less product the next time I washed it went away. Overall I was very happy with the product and would recommend to help detangle and get rid of frizz!

reviews.review_title: Pretty good and a decent price.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks, I believe it is a decent product. It is different than the leave-in conditioner I was using before from Pattern, as it's a mist spray instead of a cream. I am not sure about its hydrating capabilities, but I will say that it made my hair feel and look better. Also, I like how it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This leave-in conditioner comes in a spray form. You speay/mist it on to your hair and then brush it through. It has a very strong perfume like smell to it.  It will make your hair very soft, but I did not see it help with frizz. I think this product is designed to benefit straight hair and not curly hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's lightweight, doesnu2019t leave any greasy residue, and provides just the right amount of moisture to keep hair smooth and manageable. The formula includes natural ingredients like sunflower seed extract and green tea, which help protect and strengthen hair while fighting frizz. Perfect for all hair types, it leaves hair soft, shiny, and detangled, making it easy to style. Plus, it smells great!

Iu2019ve used this spray for 2-3 weeks and so far enjoy it. My wet hair combs easily and feels soft and smooth as it dries. I have fine hair and havent had any issues with build up or heaviness. The scent is nice too. The only thing that would upgrade it to 5 stars is if it had heat protection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent and very hydrating. This leave in leaves hair feeling soft and silky after washing and much more manageable for styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this leave-in conditioner from Verb for a few weeks now by spritzing it on my wet hair after a shower. It is a great help with then detangling my hair and it does seem to reduce the amount of frizz. It's not as moisturizing as other leave-in conditioners I have used before, but the spray is more of a mist which I feel better distributes the product. The smell is pleasant and very light, it seems to fade quickly. I will definitely finish the bottle I was given and would consider purchasing in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i usually don't use leave-in conditioners, but this one is awesome! i sprayed it in my hair when it's damp and it helped with detangling my hair. it also left my hair feeling smooth and smelling good afterward. it smells like warm florals, but it's not an overwhelming scent and it lingers. i think it also helped with defrizzing my hair as well since the ends of my hair are slightly frizzy, but after using it for about a week, i can say that my hair looks moisturized and tamed. overall, it's a nice leave-in conditioner and it does what it says!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely bad frizzy hair, every product I have used before has never controlled my hair till now! Itu2019s lightweight on your hair, and after styling, it has left my hair feeling so soft and frizz free!! I will definitely be adding this to my hair routine and purchasing again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this product, and have got to say it smells fantastic! I also appreciate that since it's a spray it doesn't seem to weigh my hair down. I'd definitely consider repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It smells absolutely amazing and leaves my hair feeling super soft.

reviews.review_title: Love this for my protective styles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this all week! It is hard to find a product that moisturizes my hair when I have braids and twists in without ruining the style. Much easier and more efficient to apply compared to creams and lotions. It's super moisturizing and makes my hair smell so good. I highly recommend this for the lazy naturals with protective styles as an easy way to keep hair moisturized. Absolutely, will be getting extras of this for my hair when I run out..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very satisfied with the results from trying this conditioner! It's left my hair hydrated and manages to reduce frizz immensely. Highly recommend.

I received a free sample of Verb Hydrate Detangling Leave-In Conditioner for Dry, Frizzy Hair. I love to use a leave in conditioner, and I love that this one is a spray. It is so easy to use and make sure I get an even distribution. It left my hair feeling soft and helped detangle my hair after washing. My hair looks so smooth after using, and it reduced my frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. I was really excited to sample it because my hair is pretty dry from bleaching it for years. I've never used a leave-in conditioner because I was worried they would make my hair feel greasy. I didn't find that with this product! In fact, it seems like I haven't used any product at all on my hair. The only real difference is that I use mousse for my waves, and my hair hasn't seemed crunchy after using this product alongside the mousse. That is about the only benefit I've had, unfortunately. I wouldn't buy this product for myself because it hasn't helped to hydrate my hair. However, I might recommend this if your hair isn't extremely thirsty like mine is. It just may not be strong enough for heavily bleached, thick hair. I thought it might be really easy to use as a spray, but it's awkward to hold and spray the bottle throughout my hair. The push-down on the spray is tough. Maybe just need to be used longer. It smells good at first, but once I've sprayed it a few times, the smell is too strong and almost chemically-sweet. I definitely think this product is good for others, but it just didn't work for me. There may be other Verb products that suit my needs better!

reviews.review_title: New product in my hair routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Leave-In works amazingly on my type 1b hair. My hair is fine and I have a lot of it - this leave in conditioner made my hair SO SOFT. I didnu2019t get a single knot or tangle the entire day. It smoothed out all my crazy fly-aways and split ends I have from breakage. In fact, my hair was so soft and sleek, it was difficult putting it into a claw clip for the day at work - because my hair was just that smooth. I applied 5-6 sprays to towel dried hair and brushed through. That was it! A little goes a long way and I can see this bottle lasting me awhile. Will be using this after every wash!! So so glad I found this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product it feels nice and light on my 4c hair and itu2019s good leave in conditioner to help with detangling my hair. The spraying makes its easy and efficient

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, frizzy, curly hair, and Iu2019m very lazy with it. My current routine is a leave-in conditioner and then a second. When using a leave-in, I need something that will work alone or benefit a second product. This leave-in conditioner from Verb is not my favorite. It left my hair feeling dry instead of hydrated, and my style would not last to the next day even with a satin wrap. The smell is a little off putting to me as well.  I also feel like this is a thin formula. I donu2019t know how to expand on that, just that it felt like I used a lot more product to coat my hair fully.  The images show my usual hair (white shirt) and my hair after using Verb only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product works well with my 4c hair. It smells amazing it's not greasy or slimy in texture. It coats the hair well I would recommend.

reviews.review_title: the best for fine, frizzy hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from Bzzagent and I have to say I love it! I have fine, straight hair that gets dry and frizzy and this is just a game changer because so many wash-out conditioners are too rich for my hair. the convenience of being able to leave this in and the fact that it nourishes my hair without weighing it down is perfect! I love the scent as well, itu2019s super fresh but doesnu2019t linger. I would highly recommend this if youu2019re looking for a product for finer, frizzy hair that wonu2019t be too heavy :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using for about 2 weeks consistently Iu2019ve really noticed that my hair is not so dull and it definitely feels a lot softer ! Smells great too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the verb product for a few weeks I like how I don't have to spray so much to see results of how much moisture it holds, the smell is a bit strong but it eventually smell less threw out the day and that's okay I love how it's easy to curl my hair using my brush with out it getting stuck in the process. Great for dry hair I have very dry hair from straighting my hair at a very young age with out the protection heat. I'd buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have really fine, frizzy, wavy hair and this product has helped me manage it. After a shower, I spray a generous amount of product (on wet hair) to untangle my hair. Once my hair dries, my hair stays wavy and doesn't have the puffy, frizzy look that it use to. This product has a scent that is nice and not too overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Noticably softer hair on first use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent for an honest review. I have naturally wavy hair and I have a history of bleach damage. Recently I have been dealing with dryness and wirey texture in some areas. I sprayed this product on my hair generously after my shower and have been surprised by how soft and light my hair feels today. I missed a section on the back of my head and I can feel the difference. My husband also tried this product and had a great hair day. The product is not heavy and has a nice scent. The packaging is nice and sturdy. I will definitely be incorporating this product into my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave-in conditioner. It leaves my hair soft and easy to comb through and does not feel oily at all. I also like the light fragrance - very pleasant smell! Iu2019ve been using this daily and would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is sleek and it is nice and compact. The front of the logo is a little hush so hard to read but itu2019s worth it. It didnu2019t feel heavy and gooey going on to the hair like other brands and it sprayed nice and even. I blow dry my hair so when I used the round brush blow dryer I was nervous it would look greasy but it didnu2019t! It made my hair super voluminous and smooth. It was a different texture than Iu2019m used to like my hair has moisture which is the point. I would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a week and can definitely say-Verb leave-in conditioner moisturizes, detangles and nourishes. I can attest that it smooths the hair by making it frizz- free. This leave- in conditioner seems to add shine to the hair while being non- greasy. It carries a light fragrance which is not overpowering. Verb hydrates and moisturizes at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited about a month or so to write my review. I have long wavy hair and only wash it about 2 times a week, so in order to get a good grasp on a product it usually takes awhile. That being said, I saw and felt IMMEDIATE results using this Leave-In. The consistency is light and thin, leaving my hair soft but not greasy. I was able to brush through my usually tangled gnarly hair with ease after ONE use! I have other leave in conditioners, but find myself gravitating to this one because of how soft and hydrated it makes my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from BzzAgent for a full honest review. I really liked the smell of this leave in. It's a really nice woody vanilla scent that I actually wished would stay in my hair longer. It did a decent job moisturizing. My hair is very dry and frizzy starting out with so I felt like it needed more  a bit more help, especially for detangling. I do really like the way my hair is more manageable afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently began to use verb after shampooing my hair . I have extremely dry , frizzy and unmanageable hair . I have used this product twice and have seen  an improvement in the feel and appearance of my hair . The frizz has been tamed and it feels so soft . I would recommend this product for dry hair , it works .

reviews.review_title: Add this to your hair routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It smells great and leaves my hair feeling so soft and super shiny. Although it packs q punch with hydration it doesnt leave the hair feeling heavy or oily. Helps to keep my fine hair from tangling throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first i was not a fan of the sell. The product works great in my hair. It made a difference when brushing it out and through out the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Verb Hyfrate Detangling leave in conditioner became one of my favorite leave in conditioners in just a few uses.  It does an amazing job at keeping my hair hydrated and tangle free without much work . It smells absolutely amazing and it stays on until the next was. My hair also seems smoother and very silky to the touch and I absolutely love that .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first thought when using this product was WOW it smells great! The fragrance smells great upon putting in your hair, but it doesnu2019t linger where thatu2019s all you can smell for the rest of the day. I applied to my towel dried curly hair and it did good at detangling. The spray bottle works great where you can you just enough throughout the middle of your hair to your ends. The product feels light on my hair and doesnu2019t leave it looking greasy. I wish it was able to also help style my curls in addition to hydrating is my only suggestion. Otherwise I love the vegan ingredients and lack of harmful chemicals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this leave in Conditioning spray, it smells very nice and leaves my hair feeling soft and not dry at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing! I opt for this rather than traditional conditioner and it works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sampled this for free from BzzAgent! Very surprised by the frizz reduction for my wavy/curly hair after using this regularly post hair washing. So far, the mist is super fine and doesnu2019t end up soaking random strands. While it does have a fragrance, the smell has been light on my hair afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in conditioner smells amazing! I love how soft my hair feels when I use it and it seems to be easy to style. The sprayer is a nice mist and dispersed product evenly so itu2019s easy to get the ends lightly spritzed. This was gifted by Verb in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I think it smells amazing and it does a decent job of getting the tangles out but better than that it is a really good leave in conditioner! Helps keep my hair super soft

reviews.review_title: Love how it leaves my hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this, my hair looked so healthy and shiny! I love the smell, it is a sweet gourmand fragrance. I definitely recommend!

I love this product because it smells incredibly fresh and like a perfume almost. It lasts in the hair for smell. As well as for the leave on conditioner itself itu2019s very nice because it does not make the hair crunchy. Leaves the hair nice and soft. As well as no frizz after using, definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this conditioner. I use it daily after washing my hair and it works great and I see good results. I have dry hair, but this conditioner helps me maintain it. My hair is moisturized, silky and hydrated. It feels healthier and has more strength. I would highly recommend it to everyone!

I really like this product. It smells good, it feels light weight compared to other leave in conditioners Iu2019ve used and it doesnt leave my hair feeling greasy! It works great to detangle my long, curly hair too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is normally so frizzy after it air drys, but after using this product for a few days I can say it definitely takes the frizz away! It leaves my hair silky and smooth but not oily or greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Bzzagent for sampling purposes. This product smells fantastic! I really enjoy how it makes my hair smell.  I have wavy hair and this product left it feeling pretty moisturized after using it. However, I will say that I didn't notice any detangling benefits after using this. Overall, I enjoy this product, however, it isn't the best leave-in conditioner I have ever used/
